item.title: Setting Level Requirements in Cases arent working...?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. Im making a new skill called Demolition. I wont explain it because I dont want it copied and released before I finish it and release it. Anyways, when I set a level requirement like this:

if (playerLevel[22] <= 50); I get no errors. Yet, it works and Does the Demolition Thing (Not posting what it does… Only friends know…) and sends both messages (What happens when you have the level and when you dont). I tried to do like
} else {, use } and {, and other things but you cant really use those in cases without errors cause it uses a break; to stop it. So I was wondering how to fix it :). Thanks for all your help if you can!

Read full topic
item.source: Setting Level Requirements in Cases arent working...?
